mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, division_no, board_content, board_header, create_datetime ) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{divisionNo}, #{boardContent}, #{boardHeader}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY b.create_datetime) AS boardNum, b.board_no, b.board_title, COUNT(bc.comment_no) AS commentCnt, b.board_header, b.board_like, b.board_view, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_datetime, '%y-%m-%d') AS createDate FROM board b LEFT JOIN board_comment bc ON b.board_no = bc.board_no
AND b.board_header IN ('IN', 'SG', 'DS', 'CT', 'QA', 'CP')
AND b.board_header = 'IN'
AND b.board_header = 'SG'
AND b.board_header = 'DS'
AND b.board_header = 'CT'
AND b.board_header = 'QA'
AND b.board_header = 'CP'
GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY boardNum DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
